name: WiserHomeforNorthAmerica
0:
”Alexa, turn off the garage light”
”Alexa, set the dining room dimmer to 40 percent”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Experience Wiser Home, your gateway to your Schneider Electric Smart Home. Alexa can now interact with your connected Square D devices with your voice. 
First, use the Wiser Home app to commission your devices. Assign a unique name to each device. After you enable the skill and Alexa discovers your devices, they will work with Amazon Alexa. You can say, “”Alexa, turn off the garage light.” You can also change the brightness of a dimmer device by saying, “Alexa, set the dining room dimmer to 40 percent.” 
Wiser Home compatible with Square D Wi-Fi Dimmer SQR226U1WHW, Wi-Fi Receptacle SQR441U1WHW, Wi-Fi Switch SQR141U1WHW, and Wi-Fi Plug SQR621U1WHW.
